structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: The legislative body of the urban-county government is hereby authorized and empowered to establish and provide such other pension funds, systems, social security programs or other retirement benefits allowable as may be deemed necessary or desirable for those employees not covered by the pension provisions of KRS 67A.320 and 67A.330, or for the benefit of the employees covered by the provisions of KRS 67A.320 and 67A.330.
law.history: Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 246, sec. 14, effective June 21, 1974.
